name: part_014
file: tmp_《BIRDS NIGHT OUT》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2024 #ReineMeptember2024 [DNDhaDTXta4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine, Anya Melfissa, and Hakos Baelz perform the song "Shanghai Honey".
Pavolia Reine talks to the audience about her 3D live performance, her DJ segment, and her gen-mates.
Pavolia Reine announces her 2024 Birthday Celebration merchandise.

subtitles.original: First up, we have the DJ performance. Wow!
subtitles.english: First up, we have the DJ performance. Wow!

subtitles.original: For those of you guys who don't know yet,
subtitles.english: For those of you guys who don't know yet,

subtitles.original: well, previously I've done a little bit of a 45-minute DJ performance on my channel.
subtitles.english: well, previously I've done a little bit of a 45-minute DJ performance on my channel.

subtitles.original: If you guys haven't checked it out, please do check it out.
subtitles.english: If you guys haven't checked it out, please do check it out.

subtitles.original: But you know, some people have been asking, "When is DJ Reine coming back?"
subtitles.english: But you know, some people have been asking, "When is DJ Reine coming back?"

subtitles.original: So you know what? I thought this would be the perfect opportunity to include it,
subtitles.english: So you know what? I thought this would be the perfect opportunity to include it,

subtitles.original: well even though we were on a bit of a time constraint so I had to do something super short.
subtitles.english: well even though we were on a bit of a time constraint so I had to do something super short.

subtitles.original: You know, believe me, it's part of... um, you know, I really, really wanted to include a lot more songs.
subtitles.english: You know, believe me, it's part of... um, you know, I really, really wanted to include a lot more songs.

subtitles.original: It's actually, you know, just a lot of Hololive songs I really, really liked.
subtitles.english: It's actually, you know, just a lot of Hololive songs I really, really liked.

subtitles.original: I think the songs are like super, super danceable.
subtitles.english: I think the songs are like super, super danceable.

subtitles.original: And did you notice? You know, we had like Holo-ID songs back to back.
subtitles.english: And did you notice? You know, we had like Holo-ID songs back to back.

subtitles.original: I really, I really, really wanted to make it work, and yeah, it did work.
subtitles.english: I really, I really, really wanted to make it work, and yeah, it did work.

subtitles.original: You know, so, yeah, maybe next time I will do a longer one, you know,
subtitles.english: You know, so, yeah, maybe next time I will do a longer one, you know,

subtitles.original: so I can like fwoo fwoo fwoo fwoo put just a lot more songs.

subtitles.original: I thought it's just like fun, you know?
subtitles.english: I thought it's just like fun, you know?

subtitles.original: I want to share, share and play all the Hololive songs that I like, and maybe in the future I can do more.
subtitles.english: I want to share, share and play all the Hololive songs that I like, and maybe in the future I can do more.

subtitles.original: And also, you heard my song "Sip Some Tea", but it's a little bit different, right?
subtitles.english: And also, you heard my song "Sip Some Tea", but it's a little bit different, right?

subtitles.original: The person who did this beautiful remix, thank you so much, Redshift-san!
subtitles.english: The person who did this beautiful remix, thank you so much, Redshift-san!

subtitles.original: 今回リミックスいただいた方はRedshiftさんです。
subtitles.english: The person who provided the remix this time is Redshift-san.

subtitles.original: They made it sound really, really cool. Yeah, I really, really like it.
subtitles.english: They made it sound really, really cool. Yeah, I really, really like it.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys liked it too.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys liked it too.

subtitles.original: And then my Gen-mates came with me and we sang and performed "Shanghai Honey" together!
subtitles.english: And then my Gen-mates came with me and we sang and performed "Shanghai Honey" together!

subtitles.original: I've always wanted to do a super, super, super fun song with Holoro because, you know, it's just a vibe.
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to do a super, super, super fun song with Holoro because, you know, it's just a vibe.

subtitles.original: It's just a vibe, you know? We're all like super like "woo! yay!"
subtitles.english: It's just a vibe, you know? We're all like super like "woo! yay!"

subtitles.original: so I thought "Shanghai Honey" was the perfect fit for the three of us.
subtitles.english: so I thought "Shanghai Honey" was the perfect fit for the three of us.

subtitles.original: Yeah, it was really cool, right? And look at these sunglasses.
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was really cool, right? And look at these sunglasses.

subtitles.original: Very nice, right?
subtitles.english: Very nice, right?

subtitles.original: Well, today's birthday live concert is about to reach the final song.
subtitles.english: Well, today's birthday live concert is about to reach the final song.

subtitles.original: But before that, I have two announcements to make.
subtitles.english: But before that, I have two announcements to make.

subtitles.original: The first announcement is... Birthday Celebration Merch! Ta-da!
subtitles.english: The first announcement is... Birthday Celebration Merch! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: There's limited supplies, so get yours ASAP! And here it is!
subtitles.english: There's limited supplies, so get yours ASAP! And here it is!

subtitles.original: The merch key visuals are illustrated by Iida Pochi-mama. Yay! So cute, right?
subtitles.english: The merch key visuals are illustrated by Iida Pochi-mama. Yay! So cute, right?

subtitles.original: Pochi-mama did the drawing!
subtitles.english: Pochi-mama did the drawing!

subtitles.original: And the concept of this merchandise is like, ooh, like neon street performance.
subtitles.english: And the concept of this merchandise is like, ooh, like neon street performance.

subtitles.original: And you see the glowing Tatang too right? With the sunglasses. So cute!
subtitles.english: And you see the glowing Tatang too right? With the sunglasses. So cute!

subtitles.original: And we can take a look at the items one by one. Let's see the goods. Jeng-jeng, what do we have here?
subtitles.english: And we can take a look at the items one by one. Let's see the goods. Ta-da, what do we have here?
